info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:59PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of El Paso County through 1045 PM MDT... At 958 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Limon to 10 miles south of Simla to near Air Force Academy, or along a line extending from 30 miles west of Flagler to 74 miles northwest of North La Junta to 9 miles north of Colorado Springs. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colorado Springs, Fountain, Monument, Air Force Academy, Calhan, Ramah, Truckton, Yoder, Black Forest, Ellicott, Peyton, Schriever AFB, Security, Security-Widefield, Falcon, Stratmoor, Gleneagle, Fort Carson, Peterson AFB and Cimarron Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
